body:
Features and Enhancements

Password Complexity
  • Added higher complexity to passwords for better security.
    • Minimum 8 characters, Maximum 128 characters.
    • Must have one character of three (3) of the following complexity rules:
      • Lower-case character (a-z)
      • Upper-case character (A-Z)
      • Special character (including space)
      • Number (0-9)
    • Cannot change password to any of the previous eight passwords.
    • New users will be required to create passwords with new complexity rules.
    • Current passwords do not have to be changed however, if a user changes their password, new complexity rules will be enforced.
